page.title: 13CLUBS,SAUNDERSFOOT
page.content: There are a number of thriving club and societies:{ {Saundersfoot Rotary Club:}formed in 1976.1st president: Dr D.S.Jones.39 members in 1985.They provide a dinner at Christmas for elderly and lonely villagers.Members also have close ties with the local Coombe Cheshire Home.In addition the club contributes to over- seas aid projects:recently old spectacles were collected and sent to India to the Royal Commonwealth Institute for the Blind,and money was raised towards a water filtration plant,also in India. {Saundersfoot Sailing Club:}70 members in 1985.Fees:Family Â£18 p.a. Couples Â£15 Single Â£10. Members are locals or Midlanders who have holiday homes in the area.Midlanders moor their boats at Coppet Hall Beach,giving rise to a special week of races at Whitsun
